thread.section_title: Business & Finance News - Wall Street Journal
thread.title: Ad Agency WPP’s CEO Sees Drop in Annual Pay

author: Nick Kostov
title: Ad Agency WPP’s CEO Sees Drop in Annual Pay
text:
The flagging performance of WPP PLC, the world’s biggest ad agency, is eating into the pay of one of the industry’s best paid executives.
On Wednesday, WPP disclosed that Chief Executive Officer Martin Sorrell received £10 million ($14 million) in company shares as compensation for 2017, a significant drop from the £41.6 million in shares that Mr. Sorrell was awarded a year prior.
